sys_sg_write_back_action_item.name: Edit (Time Off Request Todos Item)
sys_sg_write_back_action_item.query_condition: sys_idSTARTSWITH{{Time Off Request Todos Item sys_id}}^EQ
sys_sg_write_back_action_item.template: action_event={{Time Off Request Todos Item action_event}}^comment={{Time Off Request Todos Item comment}}^date={{Time Off Request Todos Item date}}^day_of_the_week={{Time Off Request Todos Item day_of_the_week}}^first_day_of_time_off={{Time Off Request Todos Item first_day_of_time_off}}^last_day_of_time_off={{Time Off Request Todos Item last_day_of_time_off}}^time_off_plan_id={{Time Off Request Todos Item time_off_plan_id}}^time_off_total_units_days={{Time Off Request Todos Item time_off_total_units_days}}^time_off_total_units_hours={{Time Off Request Todos Item time_off_total_units_hours}}^time_off_type_for_time_off_entry={{Time Off Request Todos Item time_off_type_for_time_off_entry}}^unit_time={{Time Off Request Todos Item unit_time}}^units_requested_this_coordinated_leave_time_off={{Time Off Request Todos Item units_requested_this_coordinated_leave_time_off}}^workday_id={{Time Off Request Todos Item workday_id}}^EQ
